metadata.name: Rendering Night
metadata.description:
Every artist know that moment : the Rendering.  
This art piece is a tribute to all artists, that moment we can breath between two projects (obviously, without crash or error).  
I have created this animation freely, driven by my moment mood !

This piece is FREE to mint ! You just have to pay gas fees.  
Any tips will be appreciated, even the smallest to support my work, my freelancer life and the production cost (such as 3D RenderFarm cost).

For the 3 top tippers, I will drop a special gift as well ! 
I will thank all of you, minter and future holder.

Have a wonderful day and enjoy life âœ¨

Approx. time: 20hr  
Procreate, Illustrator, AfterEffects & Cinema4D  
Seamless loop in MP4  
2160x2160px
